title: Brave 10
description: The story reimagines the legendary adventures of the 10 brave warriors assembled by the warlord Sanada Yukimura in the year 1600, in the middle of Japan’s tumultuous Sengoku (Warring States) era.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Samurai>, <Genre -> Seinen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
